channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Live action from day two of Wimbledon, where the world's top tennis players have gathered to battle it out at the third grand slam of the season. As is tradition, the first match on Centre Court on the second day of the Championships features the defending women's champion, with Barbora Krejcikova of the Czech Republic getting proceedings under way in the world's most iconic tennis arena. Presented by Isa Guha.
